instruction: Generate a creative story about a princess and a dragon.
output: Once upon a time, there was a princess who had been cursed by an evil witch. She was sent to live deep in the forest, and she was forbidden to ever leave. One day, while exploring deep in the forest, she stumbled across a cave hidden in the rocks. Inside the cave was a young dragon, who had been cursed by the same witch. The prince and the dragon became fast friends and together they ventured out into the world, fighting off the witch's spells and magical creatures with their newfound courage. And they were never apart again.
